name: Aliens Adventure
description:
Aliens Adventure is a super classic adventure game with legendary side-scrolling arcade platformer.
Jump and shoot your way to freedom as you search for your fellow Aliens and break free from captivity.

It will take teamwork and dexterous fingers to survive this close encounter with humankind. Aliens Adventure is a new arcade style run and gun game.
Returning fire, aiming, and cooldowns are taken care of by our squad of feisty Aliens. Players will be focusing on dodging and weaving through enemy fire.
Enjoy this brand new super adventure platformer game!

Key features:

- classic arcade platformer
- cool characters of aliens
- tones of enemies
- big-bosses
- perfect casual style
- and more
